Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations or personal projects. Given its high quality and unique features, I estimate its value to be well above the market rate. I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you with an offer of $20000. This price reflects not only the product's intrinsic value but also the potential benefits it can bring to you. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $20,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $20,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
